at.technikum.drivingschool.bookingappbackend.controller.BookingsController

    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?>
    getAllBookings()
    get all bookings in the system if admin otherwise get all bookings of logged in student only admin or student can access throws internal server error in case logged in user not found (could be security violation)

    get all bookings for specific user only admin should have access

    student cancels their own booking verifies if the booking belongs to this specific student, if not, not allowed to remove

  • Method Details

    • getAllBookings

      @GetMapping("/bookings") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\') or hasRole(\'STUDENT\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllBookings()
      get all bookings in the system if admin otherwise get all bookings of logged in student only admin or student can access throws internal server error in case logged in user not found (could be security violation)
      Returns:
      list of bookings

    • getAllForUser

      @GetMapping("/bookings/{userId}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllForUser(@PathVariable("userId") Long userId)
      get all bookings for specific user only admin should have access
      Parameters:
      userId -
      Returns:
      list of bookings of the user or empty

    • bookEvent

      @PostMapping("/bookings") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'STUDENT\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> bookEvent(@RequestParam("eventId") Long eventId)
      saves the booking for a specific event for logged in user
      Parameters:
      eventId -
      Returns:

    • removeMyBooking

      @DeleteMapping("/bookings/{bookingId}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'STUDENT\') or hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> removeMyBooking(@PathVariable("bookingId") Long bookingId)
      student cancels their own booking verifies if the booking belongs to this specific student, if not, not allowed to remove
      Parameters:
      bookingId -
      Returns:
